home.subtitle: Ready to challenge the magical realm ?

objective.title: Objective
objective.text: Score points by making the ball pass your opponent's paddle.

gameplay.title: Gameplay
gameplay.text1: • The game is played by two players, each controlling a paddle on opposite sides of the screen.
gameplay.text2: • A ball moves continuously across the screen, bouncing off the top and bottom edges.
gameplay.text3: • Players move their paddles vertically to hit the ball back toward the opponent.
gameplay.highlight: If a player misses the ball and it goes past their paddle, the opponent scores a point.

scoring.title: Scoring
scoring.text: Each time the ball passes the opponent's paddle, the scoring player earns 1 point.
scoring.highlight: The first player to reach ?? points wins the game.
